Title: Prayer of a Poor Person in Need

Verses.1:
Bring low Your ear, LORD, and answer me,
	for I am poor and needy.
Verses.2:
Preserve my soul, for I am faithful,
	my God, save Your servant who trusts in You.
Verses.3:
Be gracious to me, Lord,
	for I cry to You all day long.
Verses.4:
Fill Your servants soul with rejoicing,
	for I lift my soul, Lord, to You.
Verses.5:
For You, Lord, are good and ready to forgive,
	with abundant mercy for all who call upon You.
Verses.6:
Turn Your ear, LORD, to my prayer,
	and listen to my pleading voice.
Verses.7:
On the day of trouble, I will call on You,
	for You will answer me.
Verses.8:
There are none like You among the gods,
	Lord, no works compare with Yours.
Verses.9:
All the nations You have made will come,
	they will worship before You, Lord,
	and they will glorify Your name.
Verses.10:
For You are great, and do wonderful things,
	You alone are God.
Verses.11:
Teach me, LORD, Your way,
	and I will walk in Your truth.
Be united with my heart,
	and it will fear Your Name.
Verses.12:
I will give You thanks, Lord, with all my heart,
	and I will glorify Your name forever.
Verses.13:
For great is Your mercy over me,
	that You saved me from the depths of Sheol.
Verses.14:
God, arrogant people are attacking me,
	these violent people want my life,
	and they have no desire for You.
Verses.15:
But You, Lord, are a compassionate and gracious God,
	slow to anger, and overflowing with mercy and faithfulness.
Verses.16:
Turn towards me and be gracious with me,
	grant Your strength to Your servant,
	and save my life, Your servant's child.
Verses.17:
Make me into a sign of Your goodness,
	upon seeing it those who hate me will be ashamed,
	because You, LORD, have helped and comforted me.
